document.full_text: an 18th century manuscript, pottery dating back to a.d. 300 and other smuggled artifacts were returned to peru by u.s. customs officials on thursday at the peruvian embassy.
document.title: u.s. returns smuggled peruvian artifacts
lines_and_colors: an 18th century manuscript, pottery dating back to a.d. 300 and other smuggled artifacts were returned to peru by u.s. customs officials on thursday at the peruvian embassy.
